trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector"></xref> class should ignore a particular <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage"></xref> property while creating an <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef"></xref> for a <xref href="System.MarshalByRefObject"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 결정 여부는 <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector"> </xref> 클래스는 특정 무시 해야 <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage"> </xref> 속성을 만드는 동안는 <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef"> </xref> 에 대 한는 <xref href="System.MarshalByRefObject"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The MessageSurrogateFilter delegate is intended for use only by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework; you should not instantiate the delegate directly.
trans-unit.target: MessageSurrogateFilter 대리자 사용 하기 위한.NET framework; 원격 인프라에 의해서만 하면 직접 인스턴스화하면 안 대리자입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector.Filter%2A> property of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.RemotingSurrogateSelector> class gets and sets a MessageSurrogateFilter instance.

Each key/value parameter pair is a remoting message property that belongs to the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage.Properties%2A> property of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage> class.
trans-unit.target: 각 키/값 매개 변수 쌍은 <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage.Properties%2A> <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage>클래스</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage> 의 속성</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage.Properties%2A> 에 속하는 원격 메시지 속성
